projects.title: Pathfinding Visualizer
projects.techStack: React JS, Node JS, Redux, Create-React-App
projects.description: An interactive web application that helps users visualize popular uninformed and informed search algorithms in a grid environment.

projects.title: Scheduleh
projects.description: A social schedule planning Android mobile application that aims to enable users to spend more time with family and friends.

projects.title: Spreent-bot
projects.description: A telegram bot that connects online shoppers to meet minimum spending for free shipping. Developed for NUS Hackers' Hack & Roll 2020.
